ch.aplu.raspisim

Class InfraredSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.aplu.raspisim.InfraredSensor

  • public class InfraredSensor
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a touch sensor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • InfraredSensor

        public InfraredSensor(int id)
        Creates a sensor with given id.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • addInfraredListener

        public void addInfraredListener(InfraredListener listener)
        Register the given InfraredListener to detect bright and dark events. Starts an internal sensor thread that polls the sensor level and runs the sensor callbacks.
        Parameters:
        listener - the InfraredListener to register; null, to terminate any running sensor thread

      • getValue

        public int getValue()
        Checks, if infrared light ist detected.
        Returns:
        1, if the sensor detects infrared light; otherwise 0
